Learn features and what each setting does
One-tap subtitle blocking / restore visual focus
First time: allow overlay permission, then tap Enable.

What it does: creates a movable blocker on screen to cover subtitles and reduce distractions.

Main actions:
• Enable Blocking: show the blocker and drag/resize it
• Disable Blocking: hide the blocker
• Overlay permission: required for first use

Settings:
• Close button position: choose where the close button appears
• Sound effects: toggle interaction sounds
• Keep alive in background: keep a foreground notification to reduce system cleanup
• Transparency toggle: temporarily make the blocker transparent
• Auto-restore after transparency: restore blocking automatically
• Auto-restore seconds: how long transparency lasts
• Language: follow system or lock to a language
• Import/Export: save or restore settings via clipboard
